import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';// Import components (we'll create these next)
import Header from'./components/Header';import Navigation from'./components/Navigation';import LearnSection from'./components/LearnSection';import PracticeSection from'./components/PracticeSection';import WordBuilderSection from'./components/WordBuilderSection';import ProgressSection from'./components/ProgressSection';import CheatSheetSection from'./components/CheatSheetSection';import{ProgressProvider}from'./context/ProgressContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[currentSection,setCurrentSection]=useState('learn');const renderSection=()=>{switch(currentSection){case'learn':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LearnSection,{});case'practice':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PracticeSection,{});case'wordbuilder':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WordBuilderSection,{});case'progress':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProgressSection,{});case'cheatsheet':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CheatSheetSection,{});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LearnSection,{});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProgressProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigation,{currentSection:currentSection,setCurrentSection:setCurrentSection}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"main-content",role:"main","aria-label":"Korean alphabet learning content",children:renderSection()})]})]})});}export default App;
